alert.note: Alert for Allen; Evangeline; Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 1:17PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN JEFFERSON DAVIS... SOUTHWESTERN EVANGELINE...EAST CENTRAL CALCASIEU AND ALLEN PARISHES THROUGH 145 PM CST... At 117 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Buller, or 7 miles south of Reeves, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vegetation and outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Iowa, Kinder, Oberlin, Elton, Elizabeth, Fenton, Reeves, Mittie, Buller, Harmony, Topsy, Lebleu Settlement, Allen Parish Airport, and Leblanc. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Evangeline; Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis
